segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her movements are calm and rhythmic, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is pouring over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It cascades down the cabinets in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A significant puddle is forming on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already submerged in the growing pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice the rising tide around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how focused she is on that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water running onto the floor is concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This much water could cause serious damage to the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange scene, really, this calm in the face of a small flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's utterly unaware of the domestic chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is steadily creeping outwards across the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Soon it will be a much larger problem than just a wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR
